description: A simple 1 Hour Hike or 30 Minute Run that takes you out of ort Moody and into the hills above. The focus of the trial is to go to the red and white tower visible above Port Moody, this is accomplished from the ppower line trails with access into and out of these by a long gravel trail and a forest walk
directions: Head up Heritage Mountain and right on David Ave, take the 2nd Forest ParkWay turning then take a right on Panorama Drive, park up and enter the long gravel path next to the bus stop on the north side of the road
title: Heritage Mountain Tower Loop
